$aYou got $a0!
This reward has been added
to your inventory.

You can switch designs by selecting
Change Design in the menu.

$aYou cannot have more than one of the
same Sacred Seal. Any duplicates will
be converted into $a0 Hero Feathers.
You can switch designs by selecting
Change Design in the menu.

$aYou cannot have more than one of the
same accessory. Any duplicates will
be converted into $a0 Hero Feathers.
You can switch designs by selecting
Change Design in the menu.

$aYou cannot have more than one of the
same Sacred Seal or accessory. Any
duplicates will be converted into
$a0 Hero Feathers.
You can switch designs by selecting
Change Design in the menu.

They stopped to eat, and as they
talked over their meal, suddenly...

One of them rushes to be excused!
The meal vanished awfully quickly...

One of them choked on a bite!
The risk of talking with full mouth!

One clears a plate and orders more!
Not just anyone can eat so much!

$aFoes grant 5x SP for the next $a0,
and then 2x SP thereafter! (Only highest
value applied. Does not stack.)
